metadata.name: Rugs - A contradiction's story. 1
metadata.description:
This artwork may or may not be a rug.

This collection is inspired by the work of art Jack Butcher's "Checks-VV" and the subsequent Jalil.eth's derivative "GMs Edition".

Most NFT projects are built on contrasting planes: 
1. The intention
2. The pledge 
-----------------------------------
1. The intention of the founders are in most cases not genuine, this causes the roots to be soaked in greed and mistrust.

2. The pledge made to the community is positive and uplifting, creating a sense of belonging and growth.

Sometimes really good art is thrown in the bin because of this contrast which at a certain point is due to manifest; 

This Collection is meant to represent this contradiction: the artwork represents the wasted art on the other hand the numerology associated with it is meant to represent integrity, hard-work and inspiration.

Reference: https://checks.art/intro
